Projects

Triangulate

Triangulation made easy! Uses your device's GPS and Google Maps to save your current position. Automatically triangulates to find triangulation center and margin of error. Uses Firebase as the backend to enable collaboration.

source : app

D&D Encounter Helper

Helps you keep track of initive order during encounters by automatically sorting by intitative. As an added bonus, you'll be able to track the damage of any entry that is given hit points.

source : app

Dawn

A text-adventure engine build in Java! Features a command parser with semi-natural language parsing.

source : documentation

Bookprint

Upload any text file. Based on the parts of speech, see a unique image based on the uploaded text.

source

Pixelatore

Lightning fast pixelation of any image!

source : app
